730937f-a.title: Bridges - Queensboro [Queensborough] Bridge - East River.
730937f-a.text:
Queensborough Bridge over the East river approach in Manhattan is at E. 59th Street.

Hellmich, Photographer
1901

730936f-a.title: Bridges - Queensboro [Queensborough] Bridge - [Welfare Island.]
730936f-a.text:
Queensborough Bridge and Welfare Island, looking northeast across the East River.

Hellmich, Photographer
1901

730939f.title: Bridges - Queensboro [Queensborough] Bridge - [Manhattan approach at 2nd Avenue and East 59th Street.]
730939f.text:
Queensboro Bridge: The approach from Second Avenue and E. 59th Street in Manhattan. The photographer is viewing south-eastward towards the East River from the above location.
About 1912
Gift of Urbrock Collection

730940f-a.title: Bridges - Queensboro [Queensborough] Bridge -[Construction of the bridge connection.]
730940f-a.text:

Subject: Construction Photograph

Subject: Construction Photograph

730942f-a.title: Bridges - Queensboro [Queensborough] Bridge - [Construction of the bridge connection.]

The same.
August 9, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.

730962f.title: Bridges - Queensboro [Queensborough] Bridge - [View of the bridge from Astoria, Queens.]
730962f.text:
A striking view of Queensboro Bridge in Silhouette; taken from Astoria, looking south west across Welfare Island, into the haze of Manhattan's Skyscrapers.

About 1935.

Ewing Galloway.

not a dry mount item

730964f-a.title: Bridges - Queensboro [Queensborough] Bridge - [View of the bridge from East 61st Street in Manhattan.]
730964f-a.text:
Queensboro Bridge: A view southeastward of same from the foot of East 61st Street in Manhattan and showing lumber being unloaded at that point.
June 16, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
(Not a dry mount item).

730984f-b.title: Bridges - Queensboro [Queensborough] Bridge.
730984f-b.text:
(1)
Harlem River span of the Triborough Bridge; under construction, as seen from the Manhattan end of the First Ave., Bridge. It is of the lift drawbridge type, somewhat unusual in this city.
February 6, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same; from a slightly different angle, also showing other sections of the Triborough and the Hell Gate Bridges in the distance.
February 6, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
(3)
A similar view, from another angle.
February 6, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.

730969f-a.title: Bridges - Queensboro [Queensborough] Bridge - [View of the bridge from East 57th Street in Manhattan.]
730969f-a.text:
Queensboro Bridge, viewed northeastward from the foot of East 57th Street in Manhattan. In the foreground is the concrete roadway of the new East River Drive. Thru the midground and under the center span is Welfare Island with its new hospital buildings
erected by the City with federal aid.
May 12, 1940
Gift of George Jiranek
Photostat Division
New York Public Library
